briefdescription.para: Prototype : u8 DIO_u8SetDirectionReg(u8 u8Reg,u8 u8Status); Description : Set direction of the whole register.

parameterdescription.para: Status : takes INPUT sets whole reg i/p,OUTPUT sets whole reg o/p, or Custom -(0-255)values- DDRx values

simplesect.para: u8 : u8 number used for error handling (0) means no error,(1) means Undefined PORT Argument

briefdescription.para: Prototype : u8 DIO_u8SetDirectionBit(u8 u8Reg,u8 u8Bit,u8 u8Status); Description : Set direction of one bit of the register.

simplesect.para: u8 u8 number used for error handling (0) means no error,(1) means Undefined PORT Argument, (2) means Bit number out of range, (3) means status value out of range

briefdescription.para: Prototype : u8 DIO_u8WriteBit(u8 u8Reg,u8 u8Bit,u8 u8Value); Description : Write value of one bit of the register.

detaileddescription.para: Prototype : u8 DIO_u8WriteReg(u8 u8Reg,u8 u8Value); Description : write o/p to the whole register.

simplesect.para: u8 u8 number used for error handling (0) means no error,(1) means Undefined PORT Argument, (2) means Bit number out of range, (3) means Bit value out of range

briefdescription.para: Prototype : u8 DIO_u8ToggleReg(u8 u8Reg); Description : Toggles pin values of the whole register.

detaileddescription.para: Prototype : u8 DIO_u8WriteBit(u8 u8Reg,u8 u8Bit,u8 u8Value); Description : Write value of one bit of the register.

simplesect.para: u8 u8 number used for error handling (0) means no error,(1) means Undefined PORT Argument

briefdescription.para: Prototype : u8 DIO_u8ToggleBit(u8 u8Reg,u8 u8Bit); Description : Toggle pin value of one bit of the register.

detaileddescription.para: Prototype : u8 DIO_u8ToggleReg(u8 u8Reg); Description : Toggles pin values of the whole register.

simplesect.para: u8 u8 number used for error handling (0) means no error,(1) means Undefined PORT Argument, (2) means Bit number out of range

briefdescription.para: Prototype : u8 DIO_u8ReadReg(u8 u8Reg); Description : Read i/p of the whole register.

detaileddescription.para: Prototype : u8 DIO_u8ToggleBit(u8 u8Reg,u8 u8Bit); Description : Toggle pin value of one bit of the register.

simplesect.para: u8 Register reading of type u8, it will always return 240(0xAA)(0b10101010) in case of Undefined Port error whatever the actual reading is

briefdescription.para: Prototype : u8 DIO_u8ReadBit(u8 u8Reg,u8 u8Bit); Description : Read pin value of one bit of the register.

detaileddescription.para: Prototype : u8 DIO_u8ReadReg(u8 u8Reg); Description : Read i/p of the whole register.

simplesect.para: u8 u8 actual reading (0 or 1) or number used for error handling (2) means Undefined PORT Argument, (3) means Bit number out of range

briefdescription.para: Prototype : u8 DIO_u8ReadBit(u8 u8Reg,u8 u8Bit); Description : Read pin value of one bit of the register.

simplesect.para: u8 u8 actual reading (0 or 1) or number used for error handling (2) means Undefined PORT Argument, (3) means Bit number out of range

briefdescription.para: Prototype : u8 DIO_u8ConfigPullupReg(u8 u8Reg,u8 u8PullUpResStatus); Description : Configure pullup Res status for the whole register.

parameterdescription.para: pull up res : takes only DIO_EN_PULL_UP_RES (will enable it for the whole reg) or DIO_DIS_PULL_UP_RES (will disable it for the whole reg) or a custom value

simplesect.para: u8 u8 number used for error handling (0) means no error,(1) means Undefined PORT Argument

briefdescription.para: Prototype : u8 DIO_u8ConfigPullupBit(u8 u8Reg,u8 u8Bit,u8 u8PullUpResStatus); Description : Configure pullup Res status for on a given bit and port.

parameterdescription.para: pull up res : takes only DIO_EN_PULL_UP_RES or DIO_DIS_PULL_UP_RES

simplesect.para: u8 number used for error handling (0) means no error,(1) means Undefined PORT Argument, (2) means Bit number out of range, (3) means pull up resistor status value out of range
